name: Technota
tag_list: technology-solutions-provider, managed-it-services, outsourced-technology-support, secure-corporate-instant-messaging, network-carrier-consulting, hosted-pbx, hosted-email-marketing, hosted-exchange, technology-recruiting, monitoring-and-proactive-mainten
overview:
Technota is a leading, full-service Technology services provider for organizations nationwide. Founded in 2010, Technota strives to gain market share in a highly competitive market by creating innovative products that improve the productivity of an organization. The driving force behind the company’s vision is cloud-computing. SaaS (software as a service) implementations have become increasingly popular over the last two years and Technota firmly believes in contributing to the growth of the movement. Primarily focusing on small and medium businesses (SMB’s), Technota strives to bring quality service and cutting-edge technologies to an under-served market at affordable prices.

  • Monitoring and Proactive Maintenance
  • SCIM (Secure Corporate Instant Messaging)
  • Hosted Exchange
  • Enterprise Anti-Virus
  • Network/Database Architecture
  • Application Development
  • Web Design
  • Outsourced Staffing
  • Technology Recruiting
  • Managed Email Marketing
  • Hosted Trouble-Ticketing
  • Wireless Providers
  • Carrier Network Consulting
